modName: Whiterun the trading hub of Skyrim WIP
summary:
This mod changed the interior and exterior of Whiterun.
*this mod is a Work In Progress*
descriptionHtml:
*Sorry for taking so long on the update I recently had to get a new computer as my old one crashed and I lost all my old data so I will be still working on it and eventually will finish it.*


This mod Changes the landscape and buildings inside and outside of Whiterun. My intended goal for this mod is to change the exterior and interior of Whiterun to make it look more like a trading center. I will do my best to make any and all changes "lore friendly".

This mod does alter the quest Siege on Whiterun if you have any problems while doing this quest please let me know and I will do my best to fix it.

The interior and exterior changes will be separate downloads 

This mod is a work in progress and I will be updating it regularly. If you guys have any suggestions please let me know thanks!!

Future Goals
-make a proper small farming community around the exterior of Whiterun with its own market stands, taverns and a blacksmith with new npc's
-add walls around said community
-Add in new buildings, market stands and npc's inside Whiterun
-add some kind of guard shack with some guards to patrol the exterior of Whiterun
       -Another goal of mine is too add a mine outside of Whiterun and add in some npc miners


[b]Version 2 Exterior
-added some new buildings (right now you cannot enter them yet will include interiors for the buildings next version)
-added some market stalls (this version there are no npc yet, next update I will make merchant and farmer npc's)
-added a blacksmith house with a forge and a grinding wheel with a workbench (this version does not include the blacksmith npc will include next version)
-changed some of the attackers and defends to suit the new layout.

[b]Version 1 Exterior
-added in walls around the gates of Whiterun
-added in towers and flags on both sides of the doors to Whiterun
-Replaced the current creek before the doors to Whiterun with a new one
-made the bridge going over the creek larger to better suit the width of the creek
-slightly changed the location of some of the attackers and defenders in the Siege of Whiterun quest
-Removed some rubble, rocks and boulders surrounding the exterior of whiterun
-after the battle of Whiterun the fiery debris was removed
-changed some of the landscape around Pelagia Farm
-moved around the stables
-Moved the wooden outposts to better suit the new layout
-added in few braziers around the inside of the walls[/b]

Install instructions 
-place the .esp into the data folder in your Skyrim directory make sure its selected in whatever mod loader you use or don't use and start it up.

Uninstall 
-remove the .esp from the data folder in your Skyrim directory.
[/b]
author: Brandon
